Did you rush Tabi? A zed will most likely get a serrated dirk for their first component, and that can easily be countered with a Tabi rush. If he is pushing you under your tower you can also do a Tiamat and a cloth armor for your first back.


His main escape tool for the early game until his r is his w (which is on a 20 sec CD) so if he uses it to poke or blink to it to harass you, use that to initiate a gank form mid/jungle and all in him. 

I would say try get an armor item for your second or third complete item.

If you see a zed or yas and the team comp looks like they are going top then maybe try pick a champ that can play safe in the early game and not get them fed. If not then just get Doran’s shield to minimize their poke.
